Description_lang: Halondrus marks each player with a glyph for $368347d. Upon expiration, each glyph inflicts $368354s2 Cosmic damage, reduced by the number of allies who share a glyph within $368350a1 yards.Triggers $@spellname368359s at players' locations.
AuraDescription_lang: Upon expiration inflicts $s1 damage, reduced by the number of similarly marked allies. Inflicts $s1 damage to dissimilarly marked allies, reduced by distance.
